LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Smartstore.LinkedIn.Auth
LocaleResource.Value: Adds LinkedIn authentication to the store.

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction
LocaleResource.Value:
How to set up LinkedIn authentication:

  • Create a new app on LinkedIn of type Consumer.
  • Enter their access data in the form below.
  • Enter the URL listed below under My app > LinkedIn Login > Settings > Valid OAuth Redirect URIs.
  • Activate automatic registration in the shop's customer settings if you want to register externally authorized visitors automatically.

LocaleResource.Value: Enter your client secret (Client Secret) here.

LocaleResource.Value: The OAuth Redirect URI to be entered on LinkedIn.
